entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a one-shot execution mode for .NET tools #31103
  • Allow dotnet test command to override the Net runtime version #31102
  • GenAPI outputs reference to internal type in assembly-level attribute #31098
  • GenAPI is missing features that dotnet/runtime depends on #31088

Closed

  • Blazor WASM project targeting net7.0 does not build with .NET 8.0 #31107
  • [ARM64]After installing the .NET 8.0 SDK and running "dotnet workload install wasm-tools-net6" using the command line will meet: "workload ID wasm-tools-net6 is not supported on this platform". #30019
  • IncludeAllContentForSelfExtract and pre-publish tasks #24763

PullRequests

Created

  • EnableRequestDelegateGenerator by default for PublishAot #31109
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31108
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix race condition in BrowserRefreshServer #31105
  • [Forward Port] Restore Encoding for the .NET SDK upon Exit #31101
  • [release/7.0.3xx] fix columns when param is specified #31087
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #31079
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Fix documentation link #31078
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #31060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] add README #30934
    Area-GenAPI
  • fix displaying column when param is specified #31003
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Document for breaking changes, Area-NetSDK
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30973
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test trying to reproduce the race in generating wrong file through enumerating files #31059
